OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: Used to query members records for a given quote or order cart Id. The IP also accepts offset, searchByFields, searchText, sortByField and sortDirection as parameters.
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: ESM_GetEntityMembers

omniProcessElements.name: getOrderMembers
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "fields" : "vlocity_cmt__PremisesId__r.Name,vlocity_cmt__ServiceAccountId__r.Name,vlocity_cmt__ServicePointId__r.Name", "filters" : "%filters%", "groupByField" : "%groupByField%", "include" : "%include%", "offset" : "%offset%", "pageSize" : "%pageSize%", "searchByFields" : "%searchByFields%", "searchText" : "%searchText%", "sortByField" : "%sortByField%", "sortDirection" : "%sortDirection%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "objType==\"Order\"", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction1", "remoteClass" : "B2BCmexAppHandler", "remoteMethod" : "getOrderMembers", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "response", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }
